article_text:
Flandreau, SD

A Thursday night house fire in Flandreau appears to be intentionally set, and tonight, law enforcement is asking for help finding out who did it.

South Dakota's attorney general says the house on Flandreau Park Road is an entire loss after the fire. No one was home at the time. Anyone with information should contact police.
